nio/FirebaseInsert.description: The FirebaseInsert block takes incoming signals and saves them to the Firebase database under the specified `collection`. If no `collection` is specified, each signal will be saved in the database under a uniquely generated key.

collection.title: Database Collection
collection.description: Object key for accessing elements in the database tree.

enrich.title: Signal Enrichment
enrich.description: If checked (true), the attributes of the incoming signal will be excluded from the outgoing signal. If unchecked (false), the attributes of the incoming signal will be included in the outgoing signal.

userEmail.title: Authenticated User Email
userEmail.description: Authenticated user email set up in Firebase.

userPassword.title: Authenticated User Password
userPassword.description: Authenticated user password set up in Firebase.

nio/FirebaseRead.description: The FirebaseRead block takes incoming signals and uses them to read from the Firebase database under the specified `collection`.

collection.title: Database Collection
collection.description: Object key for accessing elements in the database tree

enrich.title: Signal Enrichment
enrich.description: If checked (true), the attributes of the incoming signal will be excluded from the outgoing signal. If unchecked (false), the attributes of the incoming signal will be included in the outgoing signal.

userEmail.title: Authenticated User Email
userEmail.description: Authenticated user email set up in Firebase.

userPassword.title: Authenticated User Password
userPassword.description: Authenticated user password set up in Firebase.

default.description: The results found from reading Firebase.

nio/FirebaseStream.description: The FirebaseStream block listens for changes to the specified `collection` and outputs all changes as a signal

collection.title: Database Collection
collection.description: Object key for accessing elements in the database tree.

userEmail.title: Authenticated User Email
userEmail.description: Authenticated user email set up in Firebase.

userPassword.title: Authenticated User Password
userPassword.description: Authenticated user password set up in Firebase.

default.description: Database changes output as a signal.
